AudioBufferSourceNodeBuffer.summary: The buffer property of the interface provides the ability to play back audio using an as the source of the sound data.

remarks.para:
If the buffer property is set to the value null, the node
generates a single channel containing silence (that is, every sample is 0).

-Using the Web Audio API
-Web Audio API

AudioBufferSourceNodeBuffer.value:
An which contains the data representing the sound which the
node will play.
